about_the_game:
SUPPORTER PACK CONTENT
  • Get your hands on the original complete soundtrack goodness from Starpoint Gemini 3, composed by the very talented Nikola Nikita Jeremic (.flac and .mp3 formats)
  • Starpoint Gemini 3 official artbook. Over 50 pages of digital artsy treats!
  • Four special in-game weapons to make your stay in Gemini more pleasant

*The Artbook is only available in English!
*The items contained in the Supporter Pack can be found in the Starpoint Gemini 3 installation folder\DLC\Dlc0
*The Supporter Pack will be updated during Early Access to include more in-game items and additions at no extra charge

*The Artbook is only available in English!

legal_notice: Starpoint Gemini 3 © 2018 Little Green Men Games. Developed by Little Green Men Games. All brands, product names, and logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective owners. All rights reserved. Made in Europe.
name: Starpoint Gemini 3 - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 / AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Get your hands on the official Starpoint Gemini 3 Artbook, the game soundtrack and some extra bits and pieces available in-game!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
